hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If somebody gives in charity something equal to a date from his honestly earned money ----for nothing ascends to Allah except good---- then Allah will take it in His Right (Hand) and bring it up for its owner as anyone of you brings up a baby horse, till it becomes like a mountain." Abu Huraira said: The Prophet. said, "Nothing ascends to Allah except good

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {تَعْرُجُ الْمَلاَئِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ}
chapter.eng-name: “The angels and the Ruh ascend to Him…”
